name: stalker
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who illegally follows and watches someone over a period of time: Several well-known women have been troubled by stalkers recently. Stalkers often use instant messaging on mobile phones to harass victims. Compare
prowler
a person or animal that follows an animal as closely as possible without being seen or heard, usually in order to catch or kill it: A team of professional deer stalkers each shoot about 120 animals a year. A good stalker only singles out weak animals from a herd.
More examplesFewer examplesThe stalker ran off when the author began shouting for help.Celebrity worshippers used to be either those who had a passing interest in celebrity culture or obsessed stalkers.The stalkers say they have been forced to seriously reduce the number of animals.
